hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above consolidation triggers a transition to BULL regime with 85% probability within 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility during price consolidation near highs represents pent-up energy. Breakouts from such patterns historically precede sustained bullish moves as sidelined capital enters.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for minimum 7 days
BTC closes above consolidation range high + 1.5% on >1.2x 20D avg volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 15% gain from entry OR regime indicator confirms BULL (VHF > 0.5)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC closes below consolidation range low - 2%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 35% of such breakouts fail to sustain BULL regime beyond 5 days OR result in immediate reversal to BEAR regime.
